info.name: BitView Dark Theme
info.description: BitView Dark Theme is finally here (after 1 day of working on it lol). Ever feel like the color white is overrated and want a step back from it? Well look no further BitView Dark Mode is here! Although unofficial, It works as if it was official!! Try out the BitView Dark Theme right now!
info.additionalInfo: Some areas of the website I have yet to make "dark" due to some css code that I just dont understand lol. If you want to help out dm me on twitter or message me on BitView! (My Usernames/@ is the same on all platforms)
